Package it.uninsubria.server.service

Interface UserServiceCore

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceCoreImpl
public interface UserServiceCore
Core user service interface providing user management operations. Handles user registration, authentication, profile management, and password recovery.

This service is the business logic layer for user-related operations, managing interactions with the database through the UserDAO.

All methods that modify user state throw Exception to allow proper error handling and logging at the implementation level.

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      boolean registerUser(User utente) throws Exception
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      utente - the User object containing registration details (name, surname, email, username, password, etc.)
      Returns:
      true if registration was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if registration fails due to validation or database errors

    • login

      boolean login(String usernameOrEmail, String password) throws Exception
      Authenticates a user using username/email and password.
      Parameters:
      usernameOrEmail - the username or email address for authentication
      password - the password for authentication
      Returns:
      true if authentication was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if authentication fails

    • phrasePassword

      boolean phrasePassword(String userid, String phrase) throws Exception
      Verifies recovery phrase for password reset functionality.
      Parameters:
      userid - the user identifier
      phrase - the recovery phrase to verify
      Returns:
      true if phrase matches stored phrase, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if verification fails

    • getUserByUsernameOrEmail

      User getUserByUsernameOrEmail(String usernameOrEmail) throws Exception
      Retrieves a user by username or email address.
      Parameters:
      usernameOrEmail - the username or email to search for
      Returns:
      the User object if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if retrieval fails

    • updateProfileImage

      boolean updateProfileImage(User user, byte[] imageBytes, String mimeType) throws Exception
      Updates the profile image for a user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object containing user identification
      imageBytes - the image data as byte array
      mimeType - the MIME type of the image (e.g., "image/jpeg", "image/png")
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if update fails

      boolean getPasswordByUserID(String userID, String outPassword) throws Exception

      Parameters:

      outPassword - the password to verify
      Returns:
      true if password matches, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if verification fails

      boolean verifyRecoveryPhrase(String email, String hashedPhrase) throws Exception

      Parameters:

      hashedPhrase - the hashed recovery phrase to verify
      Returns:
      true if recovery phrase is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if verification fails

      Returns:
      true if password reset was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if reset fails
